name: Desktop Clients
description: User-friendly interfaces for managing Kubernetes clusters on desktops, providing a graphical way to interact with containerized applications

name: Local Kubernetes
description: Run Kubernetes clusters on your machine for development and testing, simulating a production-like environment locally

name: Managed Kubernetes
description: Hassle-free Kubernetes clusters so you can focus on your business, not on managing Kubernetes

name: Ingress Controllers
description: Manages external access to services, routing HTTP/S traffic based on rules, simplifying application exposure and scalability.

name: Observability
description: Track and understand app performance using metrics, logs, and tracing, providing insights into the health and performance of your apps
